name: Exploring Wells Gray 6th Edition
description: As BC’s fourth largest park, Wells Gray is a prime place to do some exploring. Revised and expanded, use this guide to find trails, lakes, campgrounds and access routes. It includes information about the remote northern area of the park, and detailed descriptions with GPS data for 48 trails. Find in-depth guides to canoeing Murtle Lake, climbing Garnet Peak, and exploring Trophy Mountain. More than 250 photos and 12 maps.
